attributes.action: That the statue of Tony Blair erected in Parliament be removed and destroyed.
attributes.background: Statues erected inside Parliament commemorate great statesmen, leaders who have brought us through difficult times and politicians who have made a significant contribution to the nation. In no way can any politician who has wilfully deceived Parliament and the people be included in this group.

rejection.details:
There is no statue of Tony Blair inside Parliament. You can search the Parliamentary art collection here:

http://www.parliament.uk/about/art-in-parliament/search1/?q=Tony+blair
